name: MoonVenture
description:
The Story!

The whole wolrd is gone into madness, because of everything that has happend. 

A finanical crisis, a pendemic, global warming, you name it! It`s gone even so far, that the moon isn`t even functioning right anymore!

But why would that interest you?

The world may have gone to shit but not your hobby! So just do what you do best and look at the night sky! But maybe on a higher Position? Can`t see the moon in all it`s glory from down there.

Controls:

A/D : Move

Space : Jump

Q/E : Dash
